features.featureTitle: After startup asset validation completes, present a blocking “Asset Scan Results” screen that lists each required asset filename (logo2.png, jacques-johnson.png, kream-kuntree.png, rl-stafford.png) and whether it was successfully detected/loaded, and require the user to explicitly continue before the theatre scene renders. If any required asset is missing, keep the existing strict missing-asset behavior (full-screen overlay with the exact message) and do not allow continuing.
